Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.EXPLANATION: The difference between the budgeted amount and the actual amount spent.
The degree to which forecasted numbers match actual outcomes.
The time taken to complete the budgeting process.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.FORMULA: Total Time to Complete the Budgeting Process

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of spending that adheres to the approved budget.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.FORMULA: (Number of Budget Compliance Instances / Total Budget Instances) * 100

Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.EXPLANATION: The effectiveness of how budgeted funds are distributed across different areas.
The difference between forecasted and actual values.
The percentage of the budget that is actually used.
The period over which a rolling financial forecast is projected.
Corporate+Finance and Accounting+Budgeti.FORMULA: Length of Forecast Period (e.g., Number of Months or Quarters in the Forecast)
